synopsis.text: When the formidable Demon Lord Satan is on the brink of conquering Ente Isla, the hero Emilia thwarts his plans, forcing him and his loyal general Alsiel to retreat through a dimensional portal to modern-day Tokyo. Stranded in this new world without magic, Satan disguises himself as a human named Sadao Maou and begins working at a fast-food restaurant to make ends meet. As he navigates the mundane challenges of everyday life, the once-feared Demon Lord vows to climb the corporate ladder and conquer Earth, one burger at a time. Meanwhile, the hero Emilia follows him to ensure Satan's reign of terror remains a thing of the past. Will Satan adapt to his new life and achieve his goals, or will Emilia put an end to his ambitions once and for all? Join this hilarious journey through the eyes of a hapless demon lord in Hataraku Maou-sama!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
